#summary Changes to be HardCoded in your Workspace.

----
<wiki:toc>
----

==Local Machine Path==

*File - itjava.data.LocalMachine.java*

Edit value of string "home" to project Workspace location.
eg. public static String home = "C:/Project/myworkspace/itjava/";

==autoBuild Path==

*File - autoBuild.bat*

Edit the path of deploy-tutor location inside workspace. 
eg. C:\Project\myworkspace\itjava\automate\deploy-tutor

==Project Directory Path in build.xml==

*File - build.xml*

Set projects-dir to workspace home.
eg. <property name="projects-dir" value="C:/Project/myworkspace/itjava/"/>

==Delivery Folder Path in build.xml==

*File - build.xml*

Edit tmp_jar_location to webcontent delivery folder.
eg. <property name="tmp_jar_location" value="C:/Project/myworkspace/itjava/WebContent/delivery"/> 

==keystore Path in build.xml==

*File - build.xml*

Edit keystore value to point to the PACTkeystore file in "lib".
eg. <signjar jar="${tmp_jar_location}/${jar-file}" keystore="C:/Project/myworkspace/itjava/automate/lib/PACTkeyStore" alias="mike" storepass="pact123" />
